snippet.title: The Expanse: A Telltale Series - Dev Gameplay Commentary
snippet.description:
Join Telltale’s VP of Story Development, Zak Garriss, and Game Director Stephan Frost for a ridealong with Camina Drummer and the rest of the crew aboard the Artemis. 

Check out 10 minutes of gameplay from The Expanse: A Telltale Series while hearing some behind the scenes insights.

Then get ready for when the game launches July 27th! 🚀

#TheExpanse #Expanse #telltalegames 

Wishlist the Game Now ► 
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/the-expanse-a-telltale-series/9pfbkfxk6l3b?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=gamedevTrailer

PS: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10004308?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=gamedevTrailer

Epic: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/the-expanse-a-telltale-series?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=gamedevTrailer&sub_id=telltale
